contents.text: Thank you for calling Invitae in San Francisco, where genetic insights can change everything.
For information about test results and genetic counseling, press 1.
To speak with a genetic counseling specialist, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a genetic counseling specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me to a genetic counselor to review my recent test results quickly.
I’d like to speak with a genetic counselor to review my recent test results and what they mean for my veteran health concerns.
I need to consult a genetic counselor about interpreting my exome sequencing report and variant pathogenicity.
I need help interpreting my genetic test results with a counselor.
I’d like to consult with a genetic counseling specialist about interpreting my test results.

contents.text: For assistance with lab processing and technical support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our lab processing support team.

navigationGoals: Check on my lab sample status and resolve any processing issues.
I need assistance checking the status of my sample in the lab and ensuring it was processed correctly.
I want a status update on my blood sample’s NGS pipeline processing and QC metrics.
Check on the status of my sample and get help with a lab processing issue.
I need technical support on the lab processing status of my genetic sample.

contents.text: For new test orders and account inquiries, press 2.
To place a new test order, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to the new orders department.

navigationGoals: Place a new genetic test order for a family member.
I want to place a new order for a genetic test panel focused on conditions common among veterans.
I’d like to place a new order for a carrier screening panel and arrange for the collection kit.
Place an order for a new genetic test kit.
I want to place a new genetic test order under my account.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and account support team.

navigationGoals: Clarify and resolve a billing discrepancy on my account.
I have a question about billing on my account and need to clarify the charges for my last test.
I need assistance reconciling the invoice for my last whole-genome sequencing order and updating my payment method.
Ask about a billing charge on my account.
I have questions about charges on my account and need help with billing.
